owner_response.text:
Dear ariodamar67,

“Warmest Greetings from Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran, Where Value Meets Comfort” 

Terima kasih atas keluhan yang anda sampaikan kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi. Saya sudah mengetahui mengenai keluhan anda secara rinci dan saat ini kami sedang melakukan evaluasi khususnya dalam pelayanan. Saya telah teruskan ke departemen terkait perihal keluhan yang terjadi dan akan menjadi concern kami kedepannya untuk memberikan pelayanan yang lebih baik untuk tamu - tamu kami. Dari pengalaman ini, kami berharap bahwa hal serupa tidak akan terjadi lagi di kemudian hari. Oleh sebab itu kami juga ingin menyampaikan ucapan terima kasih karena dengan kejadian ini kami mendapatkan masukan demi perbaikan pelayanan kami untuk kedepannya. Sekali lagi, kami mohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi, besar harapan kami apabila anda dapat bersedia untuk tinggal kembali di kemudian hari dan saya pastikan kejadian ini tidak akan terulang kembali. 

Salam Hangat,
 
Supentri 
General Manager

text:
Stay di swiss belin kemayoran banyak kecewanya..
Sampe ga percaya pelayanan hotel sekelas swissbel kaya gini.. 
pertama datang saya check in jam 2 malam krna memang saya habis perjalanan jauh & urgent mau cari hotel trdekat, check in dgn staff yg bernama YOPIE, sangat tidak ramah sangat tidak membantu.
Ketika sampai tidak di tanyakan mengenai kendaraan bw kendaraan apa, sehingga saya bayar parkir mobil secara reguler dgn harga yg lumayan , yg seharusnya bs gratis dong krna kita kan tamu hotel. Saya ga sekali dua kali stay di hotel dan setiap check in pasti langsung ditanyakan mengenai kendaraan (nopol kendaraan) untuk didaftarkan parkir.

Kedua, lampu toilet di kamar 302 seperti lampu disko kedap kedip sperti mau putus lampunya, saya malas utk complain krna petugas HK aja tdk ada yg terlihat di koridor

Ketiga untuk all staff F&B tolong dong bisa ramah dgn siapapun, jgn membeda bedakan tamu, tamu yg terlihat lux disapa di kasih greeting, tamu yg biasa aja di cuekin
Overall bikin kapok & ga akan balik lagi ke swissbelin kemayoran, harga per malam nya lumayan tp service nya 0

Keempat petugas reception nya terlalu bodoh, jelas tertera jam check out itu jam 12.00 siang dan baru jam 10 pagi sy udh di telp oleh petugas Reception seakan akan ngusir disuruh checkout skrg jg krna ada tamu yg masuk. 
Ya ampun mau jd apaa swissbel kalo pelayanan seburuk ini 👎 inget yaa saya itu TAMU bayar kamar kalian di swissbel pake duit biar hanya semalam saya jg mau dapat service yg baik.. swissbelin kemayoran benar2 sangat ga recomended 👎
title: Banyak kecewanya ☹️

owner_response.text:
Dear 231292,

“Warmest Greetings from Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran, Where Value Meets Comfort” 

Terima kasih atas keluhan yang anda sampaikan kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi. Saya sudah mengetahui mengenai keluhan anda secara rinci dan saat ini kami sedang melakukan evaluasi khususnya dalam pelayanan. Saya telah teruskan ke departemen terkait perihal keluhan yang terjadi dan akan menjadi concern kami kedepannya untuk memberikan pelayanan yang lebih baik untuk tamu - tamu kami. Dari pengalaman ini, kami berharap bahwa hal serupa tidak akan terjadi lagi di kemudian hari. Oleh sebab itu kami juga ingin menyampaikan ucapan terima kasih karena dengan kejadian ini kami mendapatkan masukan demi perbaikan pelayanan kami untuk kedepannya. Sekali lagi, kami mohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi, besar harapan kami apabila anda dapat bersedia untuk tinggal kembali di kemudian hari dan saya pastikan kejadian ini tidak akan terulang kembali. 

Salam Hangat,
 
Supentri

text:
Saya menginap selama 2 malam. Secara general, hotel bersih, fasilitas memadai, dan staff pun ramah. 
Pada hari pertama, saya mengalami pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan. Pintu kamar hotel macet, sehingga saya terkurung sendirian di kamar hotel. Pada awalnya saya tidak panik, dan coba menghubungi resepsionis. Hingga telpon 5 kali, tidak diangkat. Seketika saya menjadi panik, dan mencoba menghubungi melalui handphone saya. Dan tidak juga diangkat. Saya pun mencoba menghubungi room service, dan syukurnya diangkat. Saya meminta tolong untuk dihubungkan dengan resepsionis. 
Jujur, kejadian kunci macet saya bisa maklumi karena mungkin maintenance hotel tidak baik. Tapi  saya cukup kecewa saat saya kesulitan untuk menghubungi pihak resepsionis. Semoga ke depannya, bisa ditingkatkan lagi pelayanannya. 

Di luar itu, pengalaman saya selama berada di hotel ini cukup menyenangkan. Pilihan sarapan pun cukup banyak. Sangat saya rekomendasikan untuk yang ingin menginap di sekitar area JiExpo.

text: Saya dan keluarga ingin mengunjungi Jakarta Fair dan tentu saja sangat senang jika mendapatkan Hotel yang dekat dengan lokasi JIExpo. Setelah searching peta akhirnya kami memutuskan untuk mencoba menginap di Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran karena lokasinya sangat dekat (di peta hanya dipisahkan oleh jalan). Ternyata pilihan kami tepat karena lokasi hotel hanya berjarak kurang dari 500 meter jika berjalan kaki ke Jakarta Fair. Kami juga terkejut ternyata hotel menyediakan fasilitas free shuttle ke JF, dan tentu saja kami mencobanya. Untuk fasilitas hotel cukup baik, kamar juga berkarpet dengan kasur yang empuk. Kamar mandi standar dilengkapi dengan shower yang tertempel di dinding. Hanya saja kotak sampah di kamar mandi hanya berbahan plastik (kurang elegan menurut saya). Minggu tanggal 30 Juni ketika sarapan ternyata kondisi hotel sangat ramai sehingga stok menu sarapan hampir habis, kami dan banyak pengunjung lain kesulitan untuk memilih menu karena yang tersisa tinggal sedikit (padahal baru sekitar jam 8 pagi). Untungnya Senin pagi ketersediaan sarapan sudah kembali normal, dengan menu yang standar untuk hotel bintang 3. Secara keseluruhan menginap di hotel ini cukup nyaman, apalagi didukung oleh wifi yang koneksinya lancar.
title: Tujuan Jakarta Fair, menginaplah disini!

Tgl 23 may saya menghubungi swissbell hotel kemayoran bermaksud menanyakan ketersediaan kamar utk tgl 25 may.
Diterima oleh reception, lalu ditransfer ke reservation namun tdk ada jwaban dgn durasi sgt lama smpai akhrnya saya putus sambungan telp.
Kemudian sya hubungi kembali diterima oleh operator, diterima oleh staf operator perempuan bernama DESI, dgn jawaban sangat ketus, tidak menghargai penelepon sama sekali. Sdh sya tegur kenapa dijawab dgn ketus, malah semakin mencela saya dgn menaikkan intonasi suaranya. 
Sungguh perbuatan yg sgt jauhh dari kesan pelayanan hotel. ApalaSdh semestinya manajmen sgt mempertimbangkan staf2 yg dipekerjakan di bagian frontliner dgn benar, apalagi bag operator adlh kesan pertama dri suatu hotel.
Akibat pelayanan operator seperti itu, sya mengurungkan niat sya dn keluarga berencana stay disana selama 1 minggu utk urusan pkerjaan dinas. Bagi saya, operator yg blm contact langsung sja bersikap tidak sopan, apalagi staf2 di dalamnya nanti entah pelayanannya sperti apa. Sgt mngecewakan dn memalukan. Bahkan htl local dgn bintang dibawah swisbell pun pelayan operator nya msh bisa jauh lbh sopan dri hotel swissbel kemayoran ini.

text:
Saya kembali mengunjungi hotel ini karena hendak bertemu dengan teman. Lokasi hotel ini yang tidak jauh dari pusat ibu kota serta tidak jauh dari pintu tol, serta tidak jauh dari rumah, membuat saya memutuskan hotel ini sebagai meeting point dengan teman. 
Pertemuan dengan teman lama saya lakukan sambil makan malam dan ngopi santai di Barelo yang berada di samping lobby hotel. Restoran/cafe di hotel ini cukup nyaman dengan suasana yang tenang, tidak terlalu banyak orang lalu lalang, dan tidak berisik. Menu yang ditawarkan di restoran ini pun cukup beragam, dari menu eropa/western food, asia, lokal, dan kudapan pencuci mulut maupun pilihan kopi yang cukup enak. 
Pelayanan di hotel ini cukup bagus, khususnya staf di area restoran  cukup cekatan dan ramah dalam melayani kami. Proses penyajian makanan yang kami pesan juga cukup cepat. Makanan disajikan dengan plating yang bagus sehingga mampu menggugah selara. Cita rasa dari makanan yang disajikan bisa dikatakan enak, meskipun tidak terlalu enak. Paling tidak cukup terasa bumbunya, tidak terasa plain atau datar seperti kebanyakan sajian yang dihidangkan di berbagai restoran hotel berbintang lainnya. 
Sedangkan harga makanan yang mereka jual juga masih masuk akal serta setara dengan kualitas, cita rasa, dan pelayanan yang diberikan.

text:
Menginap semalam karena mengikuti acara di Jakarta International Expo (JIE) . Lokasinya dekat dengan JIE, namun harus menyeberang jalan, sementara tidak ada lokasi untuk penyeberang jalan. Untungnya pihak hotel menyediakan free shuttle dari hotel ke JIE setiap sekitar 1 jam. 
Proses check in cepat. Mendapat smoking room karena kamar non smoking habis. Namun bau asap rokok dalam ruangan masih bisa ditoleransi, sehingga tidak sampai menimbulkan gangguan.
Kamar cukup lapang dan nyaman. Penerangan cukup baik. Kamar mandi cukup nyaman dan bersih. Hanya saat mandi di malam hari, sempat ada sedikit gangguan dengan air panas, namun tidak ada masalah di saat mandi keesokan paginya. 
Akses internet baik dan cepat. 
Ada kolam renang, namun tidak sempat mencoba karena lokasi di samping restoran. Agak kurang nyaman bila berenang sambil ditonton orang sarapan. 
Sarapan pagi cukup bervariasi. Ada egg corner. Omelete cukup enak. Bubur ayam standar.
Proses check out juga cepat dan nyaman. Pelayanan petugas, bahkan sampai ke penjaga pintu baik dan ramah.

text:
Dikarenakan keadaan rumah kemarin sedang ada renovasi, dan suami juga harus menyelesaikan pekerjaan sesuai dateline. Maka saya sekeluarga memutuskan utk menginap 1 malam di Swissbell kemayoran yg letaknya tidak jauh dari rumah. 
Seperti biasa, kamar di Swissbell memang nyaman. Namun ternyata suami saya kurang happy, dikarenakan wifi yg ada tidak mendukung pekerjaan-y yg harus menggunakan internet. Akhirnya suami tetap harus mengerjakan pekerjaan-y setelah sampai rumah.
Jika membawa kendaraan sendiri, ternyata tidak otomatis free parking. Kita harus konfirmasi terlebih dahulu direseptionist.
Untuk breakfast rasanya aga kurang, namun variasi-y cukup.
Pool yang ada tempatnya cukup menarik, bisa sambil lihat jalan raya, namun sayang tidak ada pool untuk anak2. Dan banyak daun2 kecil kuning yang jatuh di kolam, sehingga kolam terlihat tidak bersih.
Overall....cukup standart lah. Semua tersedia dengan baik, walau kurang maximal. Semoga lebih ditingkatkan lagi pelayanan-y 👍🏼

text:
Hotel ini ada di lokasi strategis Kemayoran yang mudah di akses. 

Hotel ini memiliki fasilitas kamar yang memadai. Desain kamar yang sederhana tapi tetap memberikan kesan bersih, segar, hangat, membuat istirahat menjadi sangat nyaman.

Air conditioning nya masih menggunakan Indoor unit biasa, tapi tersembunyi rapi dan juga memberikan kesejukan yg dapat anda sesuaikan langsung. 

Desain kamar mandi juga sederhana dan tidak ada yang menarik disana kecuali semuanya masih terlihat bersih. Handuk besar tersedia 2 buah dan Handuk kecil ada 2 buah. Semuanya dalam kondisi putih bersih dan seharusnya. :)

Fasilitas TV di kamar standar saja 32"  saluraj TV satelit biasa tapi khusus gambar siaran lokalnya buruk berbayang. Ada Safe Deposit Box dan Kulkas. WiFi tersedia di kamar dan area hotel tapi sayangnya sangat lambat dan membuat pilihannya lebih baik utk tidak menggunakannya.

Hotel ini memiliki lahan parkir yang sangat terbatas, restoran dan area Reception yang sempit. Sehingga waktu masuk ke hotel ini kesannya jadi tidak Elegant. Kolam renang tersedia walaupun kelihatan dibuat supaya hotel ini tetap memiliki fasilitas kolam renang.  Tapi tempat dipinggir kolam ini menjadi tempat sarapan yang menarik karena langsung berhadapan dengan  jalan Kemayoran yang dibatasi oleh pohon- pohon besar yg menyerupai mini oase di tengah kota. Fasilitas tempat makannya secara umum terlihat seadanya saja.

Menu makanan (Room Service) di hotel ini tidak banyak pilihan dan rasanya juga biasa saja. Begitupun menu sarapan paginya.

Secara umum hotel ini menyenangkan dan layak utk jadi pilihan tempat menginap di area Kemayoran Jakarta Pusat.
title: Hotel yang Simple dan Cukup Menyenangkan

Diberitahukan hanya tersedia kamar business suite saja dengan menambah harga 800ribu rupiah. Akhirnya karena tak ada solusi saya ingin bicara dengan Manager Hotel on duty, tapi tanpa saya dihubungkan dengan Manager, Nina secara tiba2 berkata ada kamar di no smoking area dan memperbolehkan tukar kamar. text:
Swiss-belinn Kemayoran tepat berada di seberang gerbang utama JIExpo, dan berada di  dalam kompleks apartemen mewah di Kemayoran. Lokasinya juga tidak persis di pinggir jalan utama, sehingga lebih tenang dan tidak bising oleh lalu lintas kendaraan. 
Menginap di hotel ini cukup menyenangkan meskipun kamarnya tidak terlalu luas. Hotelnya cukup bersih dengan fasilitas yang lengkap. Kamarnya cukup nyaman untuk sekedar beristirahat dengan kamar mandi yang bersih. 
Namun sayangnya, saat saya menginap di sini, air panasnya tidak mengalir dengan sempurna. Suhu airnya hanya sedikit hangat, namun tidak bisa dikatakan hangat. Untungnya Jakarta sedang dalam kondisi yang sangat panas, sehingga saya terlalu tidak membutuhkan air panas untuk mandi.
Kelemahan lain dari hotel yang baru dibuka ini adalah, lift dari basement parkir menuju lobby ternyata masih belum bisa beroperasi. Dan itu pun tanpa ada pemberitahuan, sehingga saya harus menunggu lama di depan lift basement sebelum mendapat info dari security bahwa lift tersebut belum beroperasi. Akhirnya saya harus menaiki tangga dua lantai untuk sampai ke lobi hotel.
Fasilitas wifi di hotel ini juga tidak begitu bagus. Dari kamar saya di lantai dua yang tanpa pemandangan karena tertutup pagar beton, sinyal wifi nyaris tidak ada sehingga kecepatan akses internet menjadi sangat lambat.
Lobi hotelnya cukup luas untuk kelas hotel budget, dengan restoran yang menyatu dengan bar dan lobby lounge sehingga mendapatkan nama barelo.
Menu sarapan juga cukup lengkap dari menu sarapan oriental, american breakfast, hingga menu lokal. 
Hotel ini juga dilengkapi dengan kolam renang yang cukup luas dan besar serta ruang pertemuan yang juga cukup besar.
title: Hotel Bagus dan Terjangkau, Namun Tanpa Air Panas

text:
Swiss-Bellinn Kemayoran is a clean hotel, tucked away near a golf course just outside of Jakarta's city centre. Make sure you can show the address or location on the map to your taxi driver as it is a little hard to find the entrance to the hotel lobby for some of the cabbies. It is relatively quiet, the rooms are spacey and the restaurant has great quality food. Don't expect extreme luxury but good value for money and a professional staff. 

If you want to explore Jakarta I suggest you download the MyBlueBird app and use it to 'order' your reliable taxi. The advantage is that you can enter address of pick up and drop off, see the number of your taxi/name of your driver in advance and you can even choose to pay by card. To the city centre your ride will often be less than $5. You don't need to tip the driver but I would suggest you round up the price or tip 2,000 - 5,000 rupiah. To us it isn't much and it helps them put food on the table.

The hotel offers an airport transfer which comes in handy if you are with a group or have a lot of luggage. Otherwise a regular taxi works fine also and may be a bit cheaper.
title: Pleasant stay. Good value.

Next day I went down to Reception and asked them and they agreed to give me the correct room.
This room was very comfortable and we were quite happy with it.
The hotel is ideally located of one wants to go the Trade Fairs as the fair grounds are pretty much across the street.
Only meals we had at the hotel was breakfast which was a standard breakfast - Eggs to order, cereals, baked beans, sausages, etc. and then there was a selection of Indonesian food which we did not try.
Overall a good business hotel.

Stayed there for a night to visit the close by Jakarta Expo Center. 
Apart from the location, for me this hotel provides good value for money.

Room I had was spacious and luxurious with a comfy bed and soft pillows. Actually nothing to complain about except for the noisy aircon. Each room has it's own aircon and the one in my room seemed to be half broken. Could not be adjusted with the remote and rattled like a tractor in the room. No other room available, as the hotel was fully booked. Had to turn it off for the night, but still the humming sounds from neighboring outdoor units were disturbing to me. 
Would have given 4 stars if not for the noisy aircon.

text: Tucked away off the main road, Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran provided comfortable accommodations for us for five nights. Breakfast had a reasonable variety of both Indonesian and Western food, and the hotel in general and our room in particular were clean. Our room was on the 9th floor, and it was sufficiently spacious. The hotel has a swimming pool that was refreshing, and we used the "fitness center," which was one treadmill, one ellipse machine, and a limited gym machine. Not spectacular, but at least an option for a short workout. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful, and the manager should be commended for having a well-trained staff that seem to actually care about guests' needs. We would stay again next time in Jakarta.
title: Good value, friendly staff

text:
I stayed in 6th floor which are smoking rooms, I asked the receiption staff to moved me in to a non smoking room unfortunately it was fully book. I had to manage my self in a smell room of cigarettes. I had to open wide my door to get a better air circulation, since the room doesnt have a window only a tiny exhaust fan in rest room and it didnt work also. 2 nights felt like a week, on second night I got my nose block already, Im sure because of this cigarettes smell. I talked to one the staff why they let people smoke in the room with less ventilation? The guy told me that most of the quests are from the government officer and they force the hotel management to let them smoke in the room. It was unbelieveable they could change hotel SOP. 

Room was clean, tidy and I love it.. Breakfast was ok. Good location also.  I was thinking to stay here oneday for another business trip, but I change my mind.
title: Smelly Room, Bad air circulation!!

text:
1. We were downgraded due to hotel's fault. In our online reservation which was done several months ago, I specifically indicated therein to provide twin bed. I also called the hotel all the way from the Philippnes to confirm and reiterate this requirement few months back. But the hotel provided one king sized bedroom upon check in. We requested for a room change but there are no more rooms available due to it is fully booked. No choice, we were downgraded and not getting any refund.

2. The guest relation officer named Nina is multi-tasking during our check-in process. She attends to other guests while she is processing our check-in. This brought some delay and made us feel uncomfortable/not prioritized since we do not speak their local language. Nina must be reoriented on how to do things one at a time and on first-come, first-served basis. Also, she was somewhat impolite during our issue in No. 1 above. We understand it is during peak hours but we asked her nicely.

3. Food is not good. And very few choices during breakfast buffet.

4. When our room is extended (because of separate online booking), the hotel automatically removed our access eventhough we advised them during check-inn. This is the reason we woke up in the middle of our sleep. The hotel should have been assertive and courteous to call in our room before removing the access.

5. Swimming pool is in front of the restaurant. How can you swim when there's a lot of people eating in front of you?

6. Internet is very slow!
title: Not happy with our stay in Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran

text: The room is standard,as one would expect at this chain. Check in was smooth. My issue is with the restaurant. Firstly, I waited 40 minutes for my appetiser, and main followed 10 minutes later. No wine available by the glass....so I wondered what type of hotel this was! However the bottle was reasonably priced, so I took it....and glad I did considering the wait. I requested mushroom sauce with my main. Instead I got pepper sauce with a bit of mushroom in it. I advised the waiter, who was in doubt, but upon smelling it, confirmed it was indeed pepper sauce, and promised to change it. Next I got BBQ sauce with mushrooms in it. This just made me angry, like I was being taken for a fool! This time I mentioned it, and my ire, as I would rather have been told that the mushroom sauce was unavailable, rather than what had occurred. Despite the incident, management was not informed, nor any apology offered. Sorry, Swiss-Bel group, but this standard is unacceptable, and shall remain in my memory for future travel.
title: Dissapointed

Feedback whether it be good or bad is always appreciated and we rely on this to show us where we are doing well or we can improve. Once again, please accept my humble apologies for your issues. text:
Always stay here during my business trip. 
Last checked out on 16th September recently. Since the occasion of my stay is for business trip, I usually arrive at hotel on around 10-11 pm. One of the problem of my last stay was the hot water. It didn't work even I complained and waited for an hour. There was no hot water and I had to take a cold shower until the last day of my check out, it was just fixed. 

And the second was the breakfast, even on low occupancy or in the period of saving cost, but kindly serve the more variant and different menu, regretfully to say, the breakfast served bad for such as stars hotel in Jakarta, only noodles or rice with potato wedges and vegetable everyday, bored for long-stay guest.

Others were satisfying. The room is clean, the service was really good, thank you for very helpful night shift staff, and thank you also to Ms. Winda from the front office staff for the great service and follow up.

.
title: Good hotel for regular business-trip

text:
Went to stay at this hotel with my extended family on Nov. 16-17, 2019.  Booked a Deluxe Premier Queen room on the 10th floor.  The check in was fast, and the room was spacious and clean.  Our room has a view to the office in the next building or houses.  The room has a small size LCD TV with movie channels + kids channels, a walk in shower, tea + coffee + electric pot, a safe deposit box, and 4 pillows (no bolsters).  I love the bedding and the pillows (they're soft and clean), and the bed is just right.  Interestingly, the aircon is a split type instead of centralized (so its kinda noisy), but it gets the job done.  And the hotel puts the aircon behind some kind of grilles diffuser, so the airflow is kinda good.  

Breakfast is located on the first floor, and quality and quantity wise I'd say it's good.  You get the usual selection of Indonesian style breakfast (rice/fried rice and some other dishes), porridge, salad and fruit bar, juices, coffee and tea, and I love the pastry bar.  And the hot coffee (cappuccino or caramel latte espresso, costs around IDR 40k) is quite good too. 

Swimming pool is located next to the restaurant on the first floor.  It's kinda small, and there's no kids pool (1.25 M depth).  The water is cold, and I think the management did a good job with the pool because it's clean but with no smell or feel of chlorine in the water.

Overall, for the price I pay (I booked directly from the hotel's website and became a member first to get additional discount), I'd highly recommend staying in this hotel if you're planning to stay in the Kemayoran area because of its great value.  But I'd suggest for you to visit your room first before making the booking, because two of our extended families have some kind of issues with their rooms.
title: Good Stay and Experience

the front office is very kind. 

The room it self was spacious enough,

The room had a big glass window with trees as the view. 
And the bed was very comfortable. 
Especially after a long flight, it feels great on that comfortable bed. 

We had breakfast at barelo, the variety was ok. They had local and some international food. 
The barelo, had a swimming pool area outside and a outside seating area. 

For a 3 star, it was a good value. And I enjoy the night there.

text:
Service in Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran was terrific. On our first day  i thought that we might not get the services we need from the hotel because saw lot of guests who checked in and we were requesting for non-smoking room but, they did not grant it to us .  However,on the 2nd day when we insisted that we transfer to a non-smoking room because i wasn't able to sleep well because of the cigarette smoke.  The front desk staff (Ayang and Winda) looked constantly for a room where we can transfer.  A twin bed room like the first room we stayed. From then on we were served all the needs we need.  With the kind approval and assistance of Mr. Hatorangan GP Doloksaribu, Asst. Front Office Manager,  he would always say, " Everything is possible" every time we request for service. A greatful thanks to Tora, Ayang and Winda who are always able to supply our needs.

On the room :  we find the room so cosy to stay it is like we are staying on our own room.   Just staying at the room is a satisfying  experience it is our staycation time. When it concerns cleaning we appreciate much the housework Cynthia is doing in our room.  She immediately  provides us with the needs inside the room.  Thanks to Cynthia, she is a good, reliable and honest housekeeper

The location was perfectly near the venue where we attended the convention. Hotel amenities are limited but, it didn't matter .

I truly loved the room and even I am at the Philippines though,  I miss the room.   I also  like their buffet breakfast .  Getting a ride going to the venue is easy because there are taxi parked just outside the hotel.  Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran is really a great place to stay because of  their cosy affordable room rates and friendly and reliable front desk staff  Swiss-Belinn Kemayoran is a fantastic place to lodge.
title: Amazing for a three star hotel

3. Breakfast in this hotel consider 90/100. Delicious breakfast and good chef will make your sunny egg in happy day.

Definitely will recommend my friend to stay here !

text:
We chose a non-smoking room but we were placed on a floor full of smokers. The corridors smell like cigarette smoke and the secondhand smoke seeps into our room, onto the carpet and sheets. The amount of air freshener housekeeping sprays in the morning doesn't help. There were also mosquitoes in the room.

We booked this room for wethefest, a music festival. It was advertised to be walking distance from the JIExpo by the organisers. Yeah, it was, if you run across a highway with 6 lanes. The hotel provided a free shuttle bus service but the timings were not very good.

However, the polite, friendly and helpful staff made up for this bad experience. Our stay came with free breakfast which was okay.
title: Okay

text:
I am currently staying at Swiss Bellinn Kemayoran. At first they gave me a room on the second floor smoking zone. I really  cant stand the smell the after effects of cigarettes. Not only was there a smoke smell but there was also a stinky smell coming from the toilet. After much persuasion from the front desk only then they agreed to change our room. Unfortunately, the room was smaller and the side table was broken. 
Guess we cant expect much from a 3-star hotel but then again we are paying for our stay and the least we can ask for is some decency in the place we look forward to for some rest during our holiday.
The staff are friendly and obliging but I would never stay here again nor would I recommend anyone to stay here. Maybe I am just unfortunate. But 2 rooms with problems...need I say more.
title: Not so pleasant stay at Swiss Bellinn Kemayoran

text:
Had (another) staycation just last night. Room was small, but not stuffy. Generally, it was a nice room. However, of all 3 available 220 V sockets in the bedroom, only one of them was able to be plugged properly. Even that was very loose. I didn't try the socket in the bathroom. There's another universal socket that would fit other types of plugs on the table, and that was tight enough.

The TV channel list wasn't accurate. However the channels were available, just not according to the numbers on the list.

Breakfast was nice. There's not much choice, but there was an egg/omelette booth that also provided pancakes. There was the standard porridge, cereal, 'western style' sausage and baked beans, pastry, etc.

Staffs were nice and everything else was okay. If I were a visitor in the city and staying for just two nights, I'd stay at a nicer place. But if I were staying for more than two nights, I'd stay here for the sake of my budget.
title: Decent

text:
I stayed few weeks ago here. The room is spacious and clean, with city view. Staff were friendly and what surprise me the most was the breakfast. I didnt expect they serve a lot of selection for 3 star hotel! There was porridge, western menus, asian menus on the buffet. Other than that, all basic breakfast selection also there such as breads eggs and cereal. The fried chicken was pretty good. The hotel was full when I was there, pretty hectic for weekend breakast but I think that's why this hotel have a lot of guest. The value for money, spacious room, and friendly staff. I feel like it more of a 4 star hotel standard. 
The pool is not big but just a good size. The only downsize is just its located exactly in front of the breakfast tables, some people might feel uncomfortable swimming there. Overall I enjoyed my stay and would love to come back!
title: Great location, spacious room

text:
Pros: Close enough to JIExpo. Walking only took around 5 minutes. Free shuttle to JIEXPO during event. Room is small. Bed and pillows are comfy. Bathroom is spacious. Fridge, safety box, electric kettle and hairdryer available. Many electric plugs throughout the room.Swimming pool is moderate. Perfect to do a few lap. Wifi works perfect
Cons: Not many option on TV Channel, on the guide there is HBO, but not in reality. Room 823 already need improvement. Shower and lavatory is clogged. You have to stand on a puddle of water. Shower do not have proper shower curtain, so the water may splatter into the dry area. Bathroom door cannot be locked. Missing security lock on the bedroom door. AC is leaking. Requesting room cleaning and iron, had to call 2/3 times before the staff came.

text:
When I walked in and was greeted politely, and immediately felt relax in a nicely decorated reception. See photo.
I dropped my luggage in the room, and went out. 
When I came back at about 9 pm due to the bad traffic, I had no dinner and ordered my room service. A very inexperience young man took my order. After more than one hour, I checked with Room service and was told that my order was not there. Finally, I got my food close to 11pm.
When I sat down and grabbed the side of my chair, I was slightly scratched. (See photo of the side of the chair). 
Not a nice way to end a day.
When I got up this morning, I saw big red biting ants on the sink. First time I met with this in a urban hotel. See photo.
What could I do? Washed them off the sink and brushed my teeth.
I am checking out today. I saw a circular to say that the hotel will be full. No extension will be entertained.
I hope the incoming guests will not face the same disappointment, as this is not the normal Swiss Belinn standard.
I must add that the staff are all polite and pleasant.
title: Unexpected Disappointment

text:
+ Restaurant staff in general is kind altho some are better than others i will refrain from placing names for their interrest but can't go without the very best names tho: Ibah by far and runnerup is Rezha. Would like to see a more direct service to the terras tho. It's kinda akward having to go to the resto or bar all the time just to order a coffee, a beer or some food. If my glass is empty, it needs filling ;) Pro activity is the keyword here. Also the tables there are more often dirty than not. Have to request for a wipe all the time. See previous keyword please.

+ Like my last stay i like the managers alot. They seem really interrested in what the guests feel about the hotel however 1 manager kinda bugs me. He keeps staring all the time. M8 if something is bothering you just spit it out but staring is straight up rude and annoying.

+ Rooms are well maintained, they definetly do a regular paintjob. Please however attend to large carpet stains as well. It takes away a bit from the overal excellent interior design. 

A suitcase stand (at least to the more expensive rooms) would make a fine addition in the future if possible?

+ Resto quality food is extremely high imo. Props. Their sirloin is out of this world ...

+Room cleanlyness altho not perfect (carpet should receive a bit harsher treatment) is better than average, well done. They sure do like to dust the hotel off quite a bit. Good for general health.

+ I highly recommend the spa. Never gotten such high quality massages in JKT before. They certainly lead the way. I recommend the traditional Javanese massage.

+ I do like and use the gym but please from time to time check the working status of the appliances. The airco on the cardio devices doesn't work (highly needed tho). Luckily when in contact with the hotel engineer he immediatly fixed the leg press device :) That's just awesome! Also the watertank is warm most of the time. ): Better bring your own bottle or 2. Also ya gotta bring your own towel.

+ Area is a plus for me. It's clean and traffic free with plenty of shops nearby, think indomart, atm, resto's, cafe's, personal grooming (hair, pedi and mani) and even a pool club. You just gotta walk around a bit to get to know the area.

+ Blue Bird taxi stand specificly for guests, that's attentitive!

+ They put alot of attention to cleaning the pool on a daily basis!

- Quality of the tv network is low and many channels are absent. Could also do with alot more moviechannels. Was really pleased with the service as reception send engineering to replace the socket wich helped things a bit. Any improvement is welcome.

-Reception staff, didn't feel like they posses the same kind of hospitality skills as the resto & bar staff however it is not a deterrent for me to stay here again. I didn't feel they were rude just less friendly is all.

*Check in however was fast. No welcoming drink this time tho :)

*What did piss me off at first was that it took aproximate a week to get a room change. Eventually when they finally gave in i forgot about it. All is well. 

*Check out was slow even though i requested in advance what time i had to check out before my car to the airport arrived and they said it didn't mather, well it eventually did when the the shift changed and i had to check out. Important note here, have reception staff on par with one another. Saves hassle for the customer at the end of the day.

- Breakfast tbh is not worth it for me altho it isn't for me in most hotels. I guess this is simply a mather of taste and not so much fault of the hotel. Can't please us all ey. The coffee is perfect tho! You can do much worse elsewhere.

- Unfortunetly since my last stay last year, they took away tables and seats from the sun area. Too bad as a foreigner i'd love to spend my days in the sun cooking to a crisp while having a brewski!

-But what really needs fixing on the terras is the stench coming from the 2 resto airco exhaust vents. That just straight sickens me. Please, the amazing terras can do without it. I'm sure you can find a better spot to exhaust than the terras.

I can go on for ages with this review but i have to stop somewhere. The summary is very simple. Do you need an affordable, clean, attractive, unique, feature packed hotel with good service? Aside from this hotel there are a few more options however not that much. Highly recommended for business and pleasure. Don't be stingy and tip the sh1t out of the staff like i do. They deserve it. Thanks to all Swiss-Bellinn staff for making my stay an excellent one. Hope you can find some pride and improvement points from this review.
title: Better than most hotels in JKT

text:
We stayed in this hotel at peak season last June, when it's still Idul Fitri holidays and Jakarta Fair was hold. Actually this hotel is located across the street from Jakarta Fair, that's why it was busy all the time during that time.
We experienced a very long check in, and one of our rooms wasn't ready at the moment because they're short of staff. And the staff seemed exhausted. We had to wait about 3-4 hours to get in to that one room.
Fortunately, the room was okay and clean. I had a nice view from my room.
The hotel is near apartment building. I could buy some amenities in the mini-market at the apartment. There's also a CBTL cafe and an Indian restaurant nearby.
The breakfast was okay. Since I stayed for 3 days, I found the food was boring because they didn't alter much.  I just ate the salad and bread. I even created my own sandwich. There's not much to choose.  
The pool was too close to dining area, and it's not comfortable to eat at the pool side, since the water was splashing here and there and inside our food. And we could smell the drainage from there. It's really ruining our appetite.
I hope the hotel management can do something about it.
title: Nice Hotel near JIEXPO Kemayoran

text:
I was due to stay at this hotel in mid-Sep 2016 with 2 other colleagues for a few days. I chose this hotel as it was the nearest and cheapest to the exhibition we were participating. 

I booked the rooms 2 months in advance of my exhibition. As i did not put any guarantee money, in confirmation email sent to me I was told to check-in before 15:00 on the first day of stay, which I will. 

After not hearing from them for 6 weeks I assumed everything was A-ok. Suddenly ten days before I was due to arrive at the hotel, I received a cancellation email from the hotel staff, saying my booking was cancelled because I had not put any guarantee money and the rooms were full with guests who paid in advance. No compromise was offered. I repeat no compromise was offered!!

When i received this cancellation email, I was on business trip, and immediately sent a complaint email within the same day about how unprofessional they were - I received confirmation email w months before only to be cancelled unilaterally ten days before arriving! In that email, I asked whether it was still possible to get 3 rooms? And whether i could pay by credit card?

They replied within a few minutes saying it is possible to reserve the 3 rooms as long as I paid within 4pm Jakarta time, as long as I paid by bank transfer (no credit card method was offered which is very strange!) I could not even pay by bank transfer as I am not based in Indonesia, so how could my funds reach the hotel's bank acct by 4pm?

I was baffled. So are the rooms still available? Or not available? I smelt something fishy! I dont know if the hotel staff was trying to steal this deposit for him/herself by offering fake bank acct. Or was it an instruction of hotel upper management?

And finally in good sense, I did not book with this hotel as they could not give me security of mind. Even if I did pay 100% now, what guarantee do I have they wont take my money and run away? Because they did in fact send me confirmation email only to cancel me later on.

Please avoid this hotel!! No telling what nightmare you will face...
title: CRAZY COWBOY HOTEL MANAGEMENT!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Norman,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review to us. What a pity to read such a bad comment from you. Needless to say we are extremely disappointed to receive this unfair review. 

I have investigated your concerns and came up with this clarification. Our team has sent the confirmation by email on the August 27th 2016 complete with the bank accounts that we have mentioned on the confirmation letter to guarantee your reservation since we run fully occupancy and we had a lot of queued booking for that period and there was no respond from you. Then we sent another email asking for confirmation for your arrival on September 8th, 2016 at 10:28 am, and also asked for the guarantee payment yet no reply from you.
On the same day you replied the email and rejected to give your credit card number or do bank transfer either to guarantee your booking. Our team has sent also the authorization form to you in order to let you fill out the form with your credit card number as a guarantee, but you rejected it with the reason worried about the security of your credit card number confidentiality. Just to let you know that our staff had been followed the policy and procedure on handling your booking and been trying our best to accommodate you needs but at the end as a professional hotel management we have to follow our procedure as well. 

We do not accept the comments that this reviewer has made reflect to his last booking experience. Sadly we will have this comment left for years.

We hope to receive the TripAdvisor support in this matter.

Regards,
Andy Djaswandi

We booked a few room during DWP event just because this place is near Expo where the event is hosted, and apparently this is the only thing good with this hotel.
 
1) Check-in time suppose to be at 2PM. We came at 4PM the rooms were still NOT ready, we have to wait until 7.30PM to get our room

Come down to check, he extended to 2.30 PM and said that's the best he can do.

text:
I was staying for five days in this hotel in doing some business trips and pictures coverages. At first, I believed that Swiss-Bel chain is a great place to stay and surrounding support. But when I arrived at Swiss-BelInn Kemayoran, I was quite unsatisfied. Firstly, most of the taxi drivers, including BlueBird, didnt know about the exact location of the hotel, until you mentioned that the hotel is located in the Springhill Golf Residence with the details of street name. Even though it is located in a luxury tower residences, dont ever think that you will be easily find a place to eat or to buy drinks/snacks nearby. There are only two small restaurants in the compound, and you must walk quite far to accessing convenience stores. So, you must buy your needs before reaching the hotel.

Secondly, it was about the staffs services. The receptionist were working too slow to serve, even just to make extend room reservation, or to ask your luggages during check-out. And when I asked them about my room and luggages, after waiting for couples of minutes, the receptionist said that she forgot it. It was also same with the services in the restaurant during breakfast. Aside of foods taste, the services are bitter. You must take your needs, such as ashtray, spoon/fork, or napkins, after you asked the staffs and they didnt bring you them. And most of all, during my five days staying, I never saw the staffs offered me a sincere smile.

I wont recommend you the hotel if you must travel around Jakarta, especially if you are mobile. The only available public transportation is taxi and motorcycle-taxi.
title: Poor Services and Location

text: Albergo comodo alla fiera, vicino all'aeroporto. Non eccelle in nulla, ero al 10' piano stanza grande per una persona ma arredata in economia. Abituato agli hotel cinesi è comunque un hotel modesto, colazione affollata e non proprio delle migliori.

text: 部屋は清潔で、フロントをはじめスタッフも非常にフレンドリー。ただし、難点もいくつか。ホテル周辺にコンビニなどのショップが無く、また中国系の宿泊客のマナーがよろしくない。ドアをあけたまま下着姿の刺青男性がドアの床に座ってビールを飲んでいたり、スタッフが飛んでくるほどの痴話喧嘩があったり。朝食ビュッフェが意外に品数が多くてありがたかった。
title: エクスポ会場に近く清潔。ただし…

text:
Wir haben 2 Nächte in diesem Hotel verbracht, vor unserem Flug nach Bali. Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis war unschlagbar: im Sonderangebot haben wir inklusive Frühstück 20€ pro Nacht bezahlt.

Pro:
+nettes und zuvorkommendes Personal
+guter Ausblick über Jakarta
+saubere Zimmer
+gutes Frühstück
+super Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis

 Contra:
-laute Klimaanlage, ohne Klimaanlage echt heiß
-schlechte Lage: keine gute Gegend und ohne fahrbaren Untersatz nichts erreichbar (keine Gehsteige, viel Verkehr)

Fazit: Zu unserem Preis ein gutes 4-Sterne-Haus mit kleinen Abzügen, die jedoch zu verschmerzen sind. Kein High-Class-Hotel, für unsere Zwecke jedoch völlig ausreichend.
title: Solides 4-Sterne-Hotel

text:
仕事で利用しました。
部屋は写真の通りで清潔感のある部屋でした。
一方でスタッフの質がやや低く思います。
朝食の種類が少なく、席数も少なめなので食べる時間帯によっては混雑しているかもしれません。

仕事で使う分には必要十分かと思います。
観光であればもっと良いホテルがあるのではと思った次第です。
title: 清潔感のある部屋でした
